code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{fetchItems}from"../../redux/shoppingListSlice";import ItemForm from"../ItemForm/ItemForm";import Item from"../Item/Item";import{ListGroup,Container}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShoppingList=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const items=useSelector(state=>state.shoppingList.items);const status=useSelector(state=>state.shoppingList.status);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(fetchItems());},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"d-flex flex-column align-items-center vh-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ItemForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 bg-dark rounded border border-light mt-4",style:{maxWidth:"400px",width:"100%"},children:[status==="loading"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-light text-center",children:"Loading..."}),status==="failed"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-danger text-center",children:"Failed to load items."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{variant:"flush",className:"bg-secondary text-light rounded",children:items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{item:item},item.id))})]})]});};export default ShoppingList;
